hero.tagline: Empowering Japanese students to excel in their academic and professional aspirations by providing comprehensive preparation and educational services.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us ?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: As your Partner
whyChooseUs.description: At Fuji and Ganesh Education Research Center, we empower Japanese students to excel in their academic and professional aspirations by providing comprehensive preparation and educational services. With specialized expertise in Japanese education systems and personalized guidance, we're committed to fostering personal growth and creating extensive networking opportunities in an increasingly interconnected world.

features.title: Experienced Tutors You Can Trust
features.description: Our skilled tutors provide personalized learning to ensure academic success.

features.title: Proven Track Record of Success
features.description: With years of expertise, our tutors help students achieve their academic goals.

preparationClasses.name: IELTS
preparationClasses.description: Prepare for the IELTS exam with our comprehensive study materials, practice tests, and expert guidance to enhance your English language skills.

preparationClasses.name: JLPT
preparationClasses.description: Master the Japanese Language Proficiency Test (JLPT) with our comprehensive N5 to N1 level preparation courses and expert guidance.

preparationClasses.name: JPT
preparationClasses.description: Prepare for the Japanese Proficiency Test (JPT) with our focused study plans and practice tests to achieve your target score.

preparationClasses.name: Free Japanese Classes
preparationClasses.description: Join our complimentary Japanese language classes designed for beginners to build a strong foundation in Japanese language and culture.

languageCourses.name: Japanese
languageCourses.description: Learn Japanese through speaking, reading, and cultural immersion.

languageCourses.name: Korean
languageCourses.description: Master Korean with a focus on Hangeul and conversation.

languageCourses.name: German
languageCourses.description: Build German skills with interactive lessons and practical conversations.
